uthuru palath sabha mathiwaranaye eksath janatha nidahas sandhana apekshakayange jayagrahanaya thahawuru karana wijayagrahi jana rali janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen ada (11) wawuniyawa saha mannarama di pawathwe.mewara uthuru palath mathiwaranaya wenuwen janadhipathithumage pradhanathwayen uthure pawathwena prathama raliya wanne wawuniyawa janaraliyayi.sathutayi nidahasayi dinawamu themawa osse palath sabha mathiwaranayata tharaga wada sitina eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya sanwidhana karana janarali malawe paswani raliya wawuniyawa nagarayedi ada udasana dahayata pawathwena athara hayawanna sawasa dekata mannaramadi pawathwe.shri lanka nidahas pakshaya pramukha sandhanaye sesu paksha nayakayan, mathiamathiwarun, palath sabha apekshakayan me awasthawata ekwimata niyamithaya. .
